blogPost.title: How great is Vancouver as filming locations? Answer by @theAlainUy, Actor, Writer, Director. https://t.co/2fsWquVbYK https://t.co/QOEuX0FcQE
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 撮影地としてのバンクーバーの素晴らしさは？Answer by @theAlainUy, Actor, Writer, Director. https://t.co/2fsWquVbYK https://t.co/QOEuX0FcQE
温哥华作为拍摄地点有多好？由 @theAlainUy, 演员，作家，导演 回答。https://t.co/2fsWquVbYK https://t.co/QOEuX0FcQE
溫哥華作爲拍攝地點有多好？由 @theAlainUy, 演員，作家，導演 回答。https://t.co/2fsWquVbYK https://t.co/QOEuX0FcQE

previous.title: Why is it so difficult to break into the film and TV industry? Answer by Gavin Hood, Director and Co-Writer of Official Secrets. https://t.co/DN4iomq4sA https://t.co/qrARknBDWb

localize.full_text: なぜ映画やテレビの世界に入るのはそんなに難しいのでしょうか？Official Secrets』の監督兼共同脚本家であるGavin Hood氏による回答 https://t.co/DN4iomq4sA https://t.co/qrARknBDWb
为什么进入电影和电视行业如此困难？由《官方机密》的导演和联合编剧加文-胡德回答。https://t.co/DN4iomq4sA https://t.co/qrARknBDWb
爲什麼進入電影和電視行業如此困難？由《官方機密》的導演和聯合編劇加文-胡德回答。https://t.co/DN4iomq4sA https://t.co/qrARknBDWb

next.title: What do you look for in founders/products in early stage fundraising? Answer by @darrenbechtel, Founder and Managing Director, Brick & Mortar Ventures. https://t.co/4MJuOEooIg https://t.co/KL3O2psWqX

localize.full_text: アーリーステージの資金調達において、ファウンダー／プロダクトに求めるものは何ですか？Answer by @darrenbechtel, Founder and Managing Director, Brick & Mortar Ventures. https://t.co/4MJuOEooIg https://t.co/KL3O2psWqX
在早期筹款中，你对创始人/产品有什么要求？回答者：@darrenbechtel，Brick & Mortar Ventures的创始人兼总经理。https://t.co/4MJuOEooIg https://t.co/KL3O2psWqX
在早期籌款中，你對創始人/產品有什麼要求？回答者：@darrenbechtel，Brick & Mortar Ventures的創始人兼總經理。https://t.co/4MJuOEooIg https://t.co/KL3O2psWqX
